meanings.definition: To color or draw with crayons.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys crayoning pictures of animals.
meanings.sent2: Children often spend time crayoning in art class.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was caught crayoning on the walls, much to her parents' surprise.
meanings.sent4: His imagination crayoning a world full of magic and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hand moved swiftly, crayoning vibrant hues onto the canvas.
